means: 比目鱼肌（指小腿后面的一块扁平肌肉）

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study changes in ultrastructure of soleus muscle spindle induced by simulated weightlessness in rats.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的观察模拟失重不同时期大鼠比目鱼肌肌梭超微结构的改变.

sentence.Network_en: Muscles examined included soleus ( SOL ), medial grastrocnemius ( MG ), lateral grastrocnemius ( LG ) and extensor digitorum longus ( EDL ).
sentence.Network_cn: 4wk后,取大鼠比目鱼肌 ( SOL ) 、 腓肠肌内侧头 ( MG ) 及外侧头 ( LG ) 与趾长伸肌 ( EDL ),并称其湿重.

sentence.Network_en: The soleus originates the upper tibia and fibula, then the calf to attach to the heel.
sentence.Network_cn: 比目鱼肌起自胫骨和腓骨的上部, 然后沿着小腿一直到脚后跟.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 右图为比目鱼肌(Soleus)此肌肉为单关节肌(仅通过踝关节),足背区曲时获得伸展两者皆在下犬式得到伸展,又如何单独伸展比目鱼肌呢? …
APPLIED ANATOMY OF SYNDROMNE OF THE TENDINOUS ARCH OF SOLEUS比目鱼肌腱弓综合征的应用解剖
健身英语词汇8997463784 - 豆丁网 ... gastroc nemius 比目鱼肌 soleus 跟腱 tendo calcaneus 股三角.

list.abs: using immunohistochemistry and confocal laser scanning techniques , we observed the distributions of PNA-BMs and S-100 in the soleus muscle .观察PNA-BMs及作为Sc标记的S-100在大鼠比目鱼肌中的分布。
the changes in biochemical indicators in isolated soleus of rat under static load ., 静态负荷对大鼠离体骨骼肌生化指标的影响.
abstract Endocytized uptake of horseradish peroxidase ( HRP ) in mouse soleus muscle in vitro was determined by biochemical method .摘要该文报道了用生物化学方法测定离体小鼠比目鱼肌对HRP的胞纳作用。
reconstruction of achilles tendon by transfer of the soleus tendon flap ., 比目鱼肌肌腱瓣移位重建跟腱术.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: modern Latin, from Latin solea 'sole'

means.word_mean: 1. a broad flat muscle in the calf of the leg under the gastrocnemius muscle
